Player History

Had first career hit on 6/6/2013, off Scott Bittle (MIL)...
1/30/2014: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,100,000 through salary arbitration...

1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,100,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 7/3/2015 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
7/29/2015: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $4,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Traded from Detroit to Seattle on 2/21/2018 (Going to DET: P Brian Moran, P Jairo Labout. Going to SEA: P Rick Porcello, RF Yasiel Puig, P Cameron Greathouse)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2019, winning 2 games with a 2.12 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 2/8/2020 to a 5-year deal worth $18,705,000 per year...
Injured on 5/3/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/14/2020 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/11/2021 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 9/8/2022 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
10/28/2024: Signed a contract extension with Tampa Bay, $900,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/16/2026 to a 1-year deal worth $1,444,444 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/1/2027 to a 3-year deal worth $575,000 per year...
Released by Boston on 4/1/2027...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/10/2027 to a minor league contract...
Released by Pittsburgh on 4/17/2027...
